name: Beard Oil
about: What it is:.What it is formulated to do:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Jojoba Esters, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables,  Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil*, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil*, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil*, Schinziophyton Rautanenii Kernel Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Prunus Insititia Seed Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Beta-Carotene. *Certified Organic.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To use, pump two to three drops of Beard Oil into your palm..-Rub hands together and massage upward into facial hair, making contact with the skin underneath..-To finish, groom beard downward with fingers or brush and style as usual..-Reapply as needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: got this for my boyfriend and he loves it! he definitely notices a difference in beard but thereu2019s probably a cheaper option out there that does the same thing
I bought for my boyfriend. He gets a dry/itchy beard. This makes it soft! Doesnu2019t have an overwhelming smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Does nothing. Skin remains dry under beard. And facial hair will only feel hydrated maybe an hour. Donu2019t recommend or get why so many good reviews

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my boyfriend a couple years ago as a gift and he has since replaced it 12 times. This is seriously SO GOOD. It it super hydrating and his beard has never looked better. He is Nigerian with 4B hair for reference, so his beard is quite thick & curly. This creates such nice shine on his beard and keeps his facial hair gorgeous and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my husband to try since he loves the Jack Black beard wash.  He says itu2019s a solid beard oil, but not necessarily a repurchase for him as he has others that are just as good that are less expensive.

reviews.review_title: Every bearded man should have this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got this for my man, and it keeps his beard soft and primed. Itu2019s not as greasy and the scent is not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband loves this product and recommends it to all of his buddies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it for my husband as he has flaky skin underneath his thick beard and moustache. Used this whole bottle and nothing improved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A gift for a picky friend and he approved of it. Softened his beard without breaking him out or causing any skin irritation. The Jack black products seem to be solid!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband loves this stuff. I think heu2019s on his third bottle. Really gives results right away. Would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this product. Keeps my beard soft and manageable.  It absorbs quickly and doesnu2019t leave any greasy feeling afterwards.  Has a light and pleasant smell that others can only smell if they are really close. I got a little bit of a breakout along my beard line after the first couple applications and then it faded and never came back.  Only problem is the recommendation is to use a 3 drops but the pump makes it hard to be that sparing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My husband picked up a bottle of this to try. It made his beard smell beyond rancid. No fragrance that either of us could pick up, just foul. Then what oil got on his beard brush ruined it. It smelled like trash and he had to throw it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it! I also like how it makes his beard feel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my boyfriend but he didnu2019t like it because it felt greasy and also left behind a greasiness on his hands that was very difficult to wash away. Tried to return but Sephora changed their policies and has made it much harder. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my boyfriend because he wanted a more accessible beard oil instead of having to order and wait for one to come from the states. He absolute loves how light and non greasy this oil is and it doesn't sit on your skin/beard, its makes it shiny and healthy looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing product,shiny and hydrating. not sticky and softens the beard. gentle smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow ! a totalement aidu00e9 avec les pellicules/peaux su00e8ches en 1 semaine, problu00e8me de barbe ru00e9glu00e9 !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this to soften up my husbandu2019s quarantine beard. Smells so sexy and works great to soften and smooth it down! He really likes the stuff. You just get this faint whiff of a deliciously masculine scent when you come in close! We have a mini dachshund puppy, she climbs up on him and rubs her face into his beard itu2019s hilarious :) I plan on picking up one of the Jack Black grooming sets as part of his Xmas gift, these are high quality products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my boyfriend because his beard was always itchy on my face but since he's started using this product his beard has become so soft! He loves the oil too because its super lightweight and smells good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my boyfriend LOVES this oil. Heu2019s on his 4th bottle already and just purchased 2 more as back up. He said that his beard has become thicker, fast growing, and softer with the use of this oil. I have noticed those changes too. His beard is no longer patchy!

reviews.review_title: A beard oil that does its job
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this for my dad, as he hadn't been using any product, and he said even after first application, the skin under his beard felt a lot more moisturized, and that he liked the light scent. He also said he'd keep using it - which is big praise because he is a no-frills man. I know you can make your own beard oil for cheaper, but my dad is not the crafty type, and he really liked this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, bought it for husband's beard and sometimes use it for my hair) smells amazing and hair doesn't look oily just shiny and soft, highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought for my husband. He loves it and its the only oil he has consistently used and asked for in the last year. Seems to keep his beard overall very soft and his skin remains healthy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my husband based on the reviews and I'm glad I did! He loves it and doesn't have any complaints. He's been growing out his facial hair since Dec 19' and now it's May 20' and I just put in another order for his second bottle. This is his  go to oil. Highly recommend!

My husband loves this oil! It's the only one that makes his beard AND skin less itchy. Highly recommend! Only reason he refuses to let me get it for him is the price - it's pretty high and his beard is long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Husband tried a bunch of beard oil and this is the only one that makes a difference! Some of the oil's smell are unpleasant, but this I can smell it all day...I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hubby has tried MULTIPLE beard oils this is his absolute favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my boyfriend along with the matching beard wash. He really likes using the two of them together as it makes his beard super soft and conditions the hairs. This is not strongly scented either. I could barely smell it, so if you're sensitive to scents definitely give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Product is very liquid doesn't feel like it works on coarse beard hair, maybe this is more for long, fine beard hair. It's very messy on my beard.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bf loves it. Says its helping with breakouts also. Originally got as a sample and ended up getting the full size almost immediately after. He didnu2019t even want to try and look for something better. u201cThis is itu201d he said

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend is particular about his beard care and he loves this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend loves this and says it helps keep his skin clear and moisturized under his beard so it doesnu2019t get irritated or itchy! The scent is also very light. Itu2019s only a subtle difference in appearance but it looks great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Make sure you oil your beard  morning and night during the winter . It will keep it hydrated. One or drops is good enough  . I keep mine in my school bag cause my beard is long and Iu2019ll apply during colder weather . After shave is great too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband had tried many, many beard products (cheap and expensive) and this is by far his favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Quote by my fiancu00e9 u201citu2019s good.u201d When I bought how this product he was struggling with a rough beard. Heu2019s been using this product for quite a few years now, and through quite a few beard sizes (he used to have a huge bushy beard) but now keeps his beard shirt. The oil definitely helps keep his skin and hair soft, helps counteract the unpleasant stubble/ scratchy hair. Definitely has helped him a lot.

Bought this for my husband as he has been trying to grow his beard for a while and it was patchy and would not lay smoothly on his face at all. I decided to just buy this to see what would happen. He noticed right off the bat that his beard felt smoother and the hairs more moisturized. Fast forward to 3 months, he has a dream beard now. It is a nice, thick, full and smooth. A little goes a long way. I would recommend this to anyone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend is particular about his beard care and he loves this one!
